name: Vapor Rave - VR
description:
Vapor Rave - A Local Co-op VR game

48 hour game jam game. (Updates coming soon! )

Theme: ~W A V E S~

Diversifier: VRiends
A VR game where people inside VR and people outside VR have to work together. - Design

Gameplay: PC player controls test subject trying to escape a maze-like facility, while the VR player moves obstacles out of their path.

Vapor Rave
